description: Create a maintenance requirement part link.
permissions: Allowed when the user can create the related maintenance requirement part per MaintenanceRequirementPartPolicy: admins; managers for a broker can create parts; technicians can create non-template parts for requirements assigned to them; operations members can create non-template parts with equipment in accessible business units; operations-with-manager-business-unit cannot create template parts; general business unit members cannot create parts.
side_effects: Creates a maintenance requirement part link record.
validation_notes: --maintenance-requirement and --maintenance-requirement-part are required. maintenance_requirement_id and maintenance_requirement_part_id must be unique as a pair. quantity must be numeric and greater than 0 when provided. unit_cost must be numeric and greater than or equal to 0 when provided. source is required on the model and must be one of stock or purchase; it defaults to stock if omitted on create.

flags.name: --unit-cost
flags.validation: Numeric value greater than or equal to 0.
